titles: A copie of a letter from Sir Maurice Eustace out of Ireland, and to a worthy gentleman, a member of the House of Commons concerning divers passages in the Parliament there also, another letter from Mr. Bacon drum-major, to Collonel Gibson of many desperate and resolute exploits of English souldiers, worthy all mens knowledge :  July 13, 1642.
author: Eustace, Maurice, Sir, ca. 1590-1661.
Bacon, John, 17th cent.
publisher: Printed by A. N. for Edw. Husbands and Iohn Frank,
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
